headline: Kraken to offer tokenized securities, including Apple, Tesla, and Nvidia, to customers outside the U.S
summary: U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchange, Kraken Partners, has partnered with Backed, a leading issuer of tokenized stocks, and the Solana Foundation to bring tokenized U.S. equities to investors worldwide.  According to a company press release, Backed will initially deploy SPL-based digital representations of U.S.-listed stocks (including Apple (AAPL), Tesla (TSLA), and Nvidia (NVDA)) and ETFs on the Solana blockchain.  Under the Trump administration, the regulatory environment has become more favorable for companies like Kraken.
